div.h4: Margaret has returned to the theater and is sad about her behavior. She has asked for your advice regarding what she should have done in the situation. You make a brainstorm with Ella and Jacob. You have to find out what other and better ways, Margaret could have reacted.
div.h6: Write in the space below. Click "Enter" every time you have written an idea. While you are writing, you can see Ella and Jacob's ideas on the screen. Click the text in the big square, when you are ready to brainstorm. Go to the next task when you are out of ideas. You will automatically continue to the next task after 3 minutes.
